metadata.title: CVE-2024-35926 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: crypto:iaa - Fix async_disable descriptor leak The disable_async paths ofiaa_compress/decompress() don't free idxd descriptors in the async_disablecase. Currently this only happens in the testcases where req->dst is set tonull. Add a test to free them in those paths.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
